defaultPosition.description:
â¢	Assist Assistant Chief Counsel attorneys and Senior Assistant Chief Counsel attorneys prepare for upcoming court dockets
â¢	Navigate national databases in order to collect and organize the necessary information required for the successful litigation of alien hearings
â¢	File court orders and other documents while maintaining efficient correspondence between different agencies within Baltimore and between other Departments and external offices
â¢	Assist Enforcement and Removal officers locate alien files and submit necessary documents
â¢	Complete inventory; receive and process court mail, motions, appeals, and other litigious mail; assist paralegal specialists process detained alien files 
â¢	Organize, route, and track files using national tracking systems
defaultPosition.title: Office Automation Assisstant
